peripheral.Button|block: 按键模块引脚%pin检测到按键被按下？
peripheral.microswitch|block: 微型开关引脚%pin检测到开关被按下？
peripheral.crashButton|block: 触碰模块引脚%pin检测到发生碰撞？
peripheral.rotaryPotentiometer|block: 电位器引脚%pin读取模拟值
peripheral.touchButton|block: 触摸模块引脚%pin检测到被触摸？
peripheral.rockerPin|block: 摇杆模块初始化引脚X%pinx引脚Y%piny引脚B%pinb
peripheral.sensor_infrared|block: 红外传感器引脚%pin检测到黑线？
peripheral.sensor_quake|block: 震动传感器引脚%pin检测到震动(数字值)？
peripheral.sensor_quake_analog|block: 震动传感器引脚%pin读取震动模拟值
peripheral.sensor_illumination|block: 光敏传感器引脚%pin读取光照强度模拟值
peripheral.dht11value|block: DHT11温湿度传感器引脚%dht11pin |读取 %dht11type
peripheral.sensor_temperature|block: 温度传感器引脚%pin读取环境温度
peripheral.sensor_hall|block: 霍尔传感器引脚%pin读取模拟值
peripheral.sensor_tracking|block: 循迹传感器引脚%pin检测到黑线？
